title: Indian-Born, Social Impact Entrepreneur Kunal Sood Launched AudacityAI at 80th UNGA: Championing Ethical AI Leadership
description: At the AUDACITY UNGA 100 Disruptors Summit at UN Headquarters, spiritual leader Arvind Sood reframed the AI discourse with the question “Who Am I, to Who Am AI?”, emphasizing that human character, values, and moral courage—not algorithms—will determine the trajectory of artificial intelligence.
content: As artificial intelligence transforms economies and governance worldwide, Indian-origin social impact entrepreneur Kunal Sood unveiled AudacityAI during the 80th United Nations General Assembly in September 2025. The initiative introduces a leadershi... [5441 chars]

title: India's AI to be inclusive by design, sovereign by capability: Dharmendra Pradhan
description: New Delhi, Feb 12 (PTI) Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan on Thursday said India’s Artificial Intelligence (AI) will be inclusive by design, interoperable by architecture and sovereign by capability. The minister made the comments at the inaugural session of Bharat Bodhan AI Conclave 2026 here. The two-day conclave will bring together senior policymakers from the […]
content:

title: India's AI to be inclusive by design, sovereign by capability: Dharmendra Pradhan
description: Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan on Thursday said Indias Artificial Intelligence AI will be inclusive by design, interoperable by architecture and sovereign by capability. I call upon all the stakeholders to build scalable, responsible, ethical, inclusive and India-centric sovereign AI models for transforming our education and realising the goal of Viksit Bharat, Pradhan said.

title: Is Claude Coding Us Into Irrelevance?
description: Dario Amodei shares his utopian — and dystopian — predictions for the near-term future of artificial intelligence.
content: Are the lords of artificial intelligence on the side of the human race? That’s the core question I had for this week’s guest. Dario Amodei is the chief executive of Anthropic, one of the fastest growing AI companies. He’s something of a utopian when ... [1522 chars]

title: IIM Lucknow announces 3 AI programmes, JEE Advanced mandatory for undergraduate course
description: IIM Lucknow has introduced three new Artificial Intelligence programmes, including a first-of-its-kind undergraduate course admitting students through JEE Advanced. The move aims to blend AI, management, and national development priorities.
content: Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan on Thursday unveiled three new Artificial Intelligence-focused programmes at the Indian Institute of Management (IIM) Lucknow, marking a major expansion of AI-led higher education in India. One of the key h... [2867 chars]

title: AI, Pope Leo XIV and a warning from 'Harry Potter'
description: Terry Mattingly writes: Artificial intelligence, Pope Leo XIV and a warning from "Harry Potter."
content:
AI bots used the Moltbook online platform to create the Church of Molt, with doctrines to guide digital life.
The pope has offered his latest commentary on this era in which AI entrepreneurs push programs offering users digital friends, oracles, love... [4759 chars]

title: World Wide Web inventor Tim Berners-Lee warns 'AI is becoming more powerful than its creator'
description: Sir Tim Berners-Lee, inventor of the World Wide Web, warns about artificial intelligence surpassing human control. He stresses that AI should serve users, not just corporate interests. Berners-Lee advocates for user-controlled data systems. He reflects on the internet's shift from a decentralized space to one dominated by large platforms, raising concerns about power and accountability in the digital era.
content:

title: ByteDance's new AI video model goes viral as China looks for second DeepSeek moment
description: ByteDance's new video-generating artificial intelligence model ​has already impressed the likes of Elon Musk and gone viral in China, where it has been compared to DeepSeek and won praise for its ability to produce cinematic storylines with just a few ‌prompts.
